## How to use

* The Plot shows the interaction of two random variables with differnt probabilty distributions.

* The variable presented in the x axis has Chi-Squared distribution, while the one in the y axis is normally distributed.

* You can change sample size and distribution parameters using the commands on the left.

* Manipulating transparency helps understanding where the points are concentrated.

* Be sure to redefine axis' limits to zoom in or out and explore the plot!
